dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2250 EAS:
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

engrossed-amendment-form.current-chamber: In the Senate of the United States,

section.text: That the bill from the House of Representatives (H.R. 2250) entitled An Act making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2016, and for other purposes., do pass with the following

amendment-instruction.text: Strike all after the enacting clause and insert the following:

amendment-block.continuation-text: That the Continuing Appropriations Act, 2016 (Public Law 114–53) is amended by striking the date specified in section 106(3) and inserting “December 16, 2015”.

paragraph.text: This Act may be cited as the “Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2016”.

title-amends.official-title-amendment: Amend the title so as to read: Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2016.
